TopicTitle: [Stock] Grand Tour and Tech Tree Completion in One Launch with Tier 0 Parts

Articles.Content:
The challenge is titular and pass-fail. In one launch you must complete a Grand Tour of the Kerbol system and fill out the tech tree with Tier 0 stock parts.

Additional Rules

  1. The Grand Tour is a manned landing on and return from every body in the Kerbol system.
  2. Tier 0 stock parts are the parts in the first node of the tech tree.
  3. No orbital assembly, however cleverly accomplished.
  4. No mods except the latest version of Kerbal Engineer Redux.
  5. No glitches, exploits, hacks, etc.

Proving Accomplishment

Screenshot your vessel before launch and per body during:

  • Transfer
  • Capture
  • Descent
  • Landing
  • Ascent

Kodspeed,

-Duxwing

I think it's possible.

If I'm doing the math right, maximum possible science with surface samples, crew reports and EVAs is 15907, and you need about 10k to max out the tree.
Improbable. I'll need to see the OP's entry before I believe it can be done.
In infinite launches with tier 0 parts, definitely possible. In one? Not as much. Sorry.

Duxwing please read the Challenge Submission Guide. Until you can demonstrate that your challenge is indeed possible this thread will be locked. Feel free to message a moderator with your demonstration or if you would like it re-opened for changes that would make it more feasible.
